Package DataBase

Class DataLists

java.lang.Object
DataBase.DataLists
public abstract class DataLists extends Object
Author:
Hamza Yousaf This is the class for CollectionLists. It contains variables and methods that populates combo boxes and helps with time-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • checkTimeRange

      public static boolean checkTimeRange(LocalDateTime startLDT, LocalDateTime endLDT)
      Checks if a given appointment time range falls within the working hours of the Eastern Time (ET) office.
      Parameters:
      startLDT - The start time of the appointment.
      endLDT - The end time of the appointment.
      Returns:
      `true` if the appointment falls within the ET office hours, `false` otherwise.

    • loadTimes

      public static void loadTimes()
      Loads a list of time slots in 30-minute intervals from 00:00 to 23:30.

    • getTimes

      Gets the list of time slots in 30-minute intervals.
      Returns:

    • returnUpdateLocation

      public static int returnUpdateLocation(String location)
      Returns the index of a given location in the list of office locations.
      Parameters:
      location - The location to search for.
      Returns:
      The index of the location in the list.
